description: React component for user settings, allowing users to select language, age group, and grade level preferences.

methods.name: Settings()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the user settings page with options for language, age group, and grade level.

methods.name: handleAgeChange
methods.description: Handles change in user's age group, updating their profile and adjusting grade options accordingly.

methods.name: handleLangChange
methods.description: Handles language selection change, updating the user's language preference.

methods.name: handleGradeChange
methods.description: Handles grade level selection change, updating the user's profile.
